song.title: Hillsong - This I Believe (Chords)
song.author: Hillsong
song.lyrics:
[] This I believe (The Creed)
[Intro]
.[ F Am G C ] 2X
[Verse 1] .F Am G Our Father everlasting . C F The all creating One . G C God Almighty .F Am G Through Your Holy Spirit . C F Conceiving Christ the Son . G Jesus our Saviour
[Chorus] .C G I believe in God our Father .F G I believe in Christ the Son .Am I believe in the Holy Spirit .F Our God is three in one .C G I believe in the resurrection .F G That we will rise again .Am For I believe in the . F G Name of Jesus
[Instrumental] .[ F Am G C ] 2X
[Verse 2] .F Am G Our Judge and our Defen-der . C F Suffered and cruci-fied . G C Forgiveness is in You .F Am G Descended into dark-ness . C F You rose in glorious life . G Forever seated high
[Chorus] .C G I believe in God our Father .F G I believe in Christ the Son .Am I believe in the Holy Spirit .F Our God is three in one .C G I believe in the resurrection .F G That we will rise again .Am For I believe in the . F G Name of Jesus
[Bridge] .C F Am G C/E I believe in You . F Am G C/E I believe You rose again . F G I believe that Jesus Christ . C is Lord
[Chorus] x2
.C G I believe in God our Father .F G I believe in Christ the Son .Am I believe in the Holy Spirit .F Our God is three in one .C G I believe in the resurrection .F G That we will rise again .Am For I believe in the . F G Name of Jesus
[Ending chorus] .C G I believe in life eternal .F G I believe in the virgin birth .Am I believe in the saints communion .F And in Your holy Church .C G I believe in the resurrection .F G When Jesus comes again .Am For I believe in the . F G Name of Jesus
